articles.title: 4 Dead in Indiana Mall Shooting, Officials Say
articles.description: The attack by a gunman unfolded at the Greenwood Park Mall in Greenwood, Ind., on Sunday before another armed man fatally shot the assailant, city officials said.
articles.content:
Three people were killed at a mall in Greenwood, Ind., on Sunday in a shooting that ended when an armed man fatally shot the gunman, city authorities said.
